name: Replication data for: Search Strategy for Systematic Review of Depression in Head & Neck Cancer Patients

description: Provides the search strategies used in Ovid MEDLINE, Ovid EMBASE, Ovid PsycInfo, EBSCO CINAHL, PubMed, Scopus and Web of Science Core Collection. Searches were run on August 20, 2014.

citation.text: A Systematic Review of Depression among Head & Neck Cancer Patients
